IXO RAM597 Volkswagen Polo R 2014 Rallye de France Winner J. M. Latvala/M. Anttila

12th WRC win for Jari Matti Latvala
21st WRC win for Volkswagen
20th WRC win for Polo R



Jari-Matti Latvala’s win in the 2014 Rallye de France was significant for 3 reasons: 1) it was his first win in the event, 2) it was the first time a non-French driver (and a non-Sebastien) won the event, and 3) it was first asphalt victory for a Finnish crew in almost 15 years. The last time a Finnish crew won on asphalt was when Tommi Mäkinen and Risto Mannisenmäki won the 1999 Rallye Sanremo. With the exception of stage 2, Latvala led the rally from start to finish.
